reviewText: No very instructive.  Not for beginners.
As above. I found the product disgusting. I put it in the trash with the rest of the garbage. It is somewhere in the landfill.
Good video. Not so much for the beginner. The guys doing great yoga were definitely put in the front two rows.

This is great but I wish it would be more honest in the sence of when men get together completely nude, sometimes we get a bit excited and it is ok.  There is nothing wrong for our bodies are beautiful!!!  I'm glad to see that men can work out together and should in the buff.  It helps with male bonding I think.
The dvd is good quality. The nudity is pretty much a marketing technique as there is no real connection made between doing the basic yoga techniques and being naked while performing the moves.
I've gotten an number of Aaron Star's DVDs and this set definitely measures up to the superior quality I've come to expect from his work.

...these are really good, solid practices.  as a yoga teacher i'm always looking for inspiration and have some great sequences on these dvd's.  i don't think i could muster the confidence to participate in an actual hny class these are the next best thing.
I would love to be in one of his classes.. This is a great way to get into shape.. And I do need to get my body in shape.. I continue to watch every one of his DVD's.  Thank You, Don

I've been asked to make a comment regarding my purchase.  I have to say that I did not enjoy this series as much as the first, which is more instructional.  I guess I just can't imagine myself sitting on the beach waiting for the sun to come up and start exercising.  Thank goodness some of the participants were older and had a little more meat on them.  I identified.  Still, the series is beautifully prepared and I don't regret buying it.

Conjouring up images of "hot nude yoga" may be an interesting way to spend a few minutes. However, it will do little to prepare you for Hot Nude Yoga Hawaii. In this set Aaron takes his world-renowned yoga experience to paradise. Each of the DVDs in this series stands strongly on its own. My favorites were Disk One/Day One and The Art of Touch. Day One provides anyone not familiar with Hot Nude Yoga with a great look at what a "typical" HNY class is about. Coming Out in Hawaii, also on this disk, is the voice of those who practice Hot Nude Yoga - why we do so, and what the experience means to us. The Art of Touch is one of the most beautiful sequences of male-to-male intimacy that you will ever see. Together, these items reflect the range of participants, and the accessibility of Hot Nude Yoga, for all. Whether you are considering beginning a yoga practice, want to advance your current practice, or are looking for a pleasing audio-visual experience, Hot Nude Yoga Hawaii is the answer. It makes a great gift as well!
